### ✍️ Submit a Block Note

Want to leave your message on the blockchain?

---

**Block Number**  
(e.g. 840002)

**Your Message**  
(e.g. "HODLing through the storm – @yourhandle")

**Inscription ID**  
(e.g. abc123...xyz)

---

We’ll review and add it to the public notebook!
